Notes

This is local. This page is for testing on a computer that is not connected to the Internet.

All pages are relative addressed.

In particular, this paragraph does not terminate.

Names

The following links do not have rel="ln-localname" in their listing.

  • shrub - href="shrub.html"
  • bush - href="bush.html"
  • weed - href="weed.html"

The following links do have rel="ln-localname" in their listing.

  • chair - rel="ln-localname" href="chair.html"
  • table - rel="ln-localname" href="table.html"
  • Johns House - rel="ln-localname" href="../johnshouse/homepage.html"
  • Janes House - rel="ln-localname" href="../janeshouse/homepage.html"

A pattern:

  • Computer - rel="ln-pattern" href="computer/{number}.html"

Namespaces:

  • this - rel="ln-namespace" href=""
  • this2 - rel="ln-namespace" href="namespace.html"
  • Johns House - rel="ln-namespace" href="../johnshouse/namespace.html"
  • Janes House - rel="ln-namespace" href="../janeshouse/namespace.html"

To be ignored:

  • back to homepage - rel="ln-ignore" href="homepage.html"
